column1: * 1910 – J.R.R. Tolkien is awarded an Open Classical Exhibition for classical languages to Exeter College.
* 1937 - Charles Furth writes Letter to Charles Furth (19 December 1937).
* 1947 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Malcolm Knox.
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien and his wife went to see The Hobbit (1967 stage adaptation) musical performance.
* 2003 – The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King is released in cinemas.
* 2014 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies is released in the United States.
